mapper.select: SELECT * FROM subjects WHERE deleted = false
SELECT s.* FROM subjects s JOIN questions q ON s.subject_id = q.subject_id AND q.deleted = FALSE WHERE s.deleted = FALSE GROUP BY s.SUBJECT_ID
SELECT l.level FROM levels l JOIN subjects s ON l.subject_id = s.subject_id WHERE s.subject_name = #{subjectName} AND l.deleted = false

SELECT DISTINCT l.level FROM levels l JOIN questions q ON l.level = q.level AND l.subject_id = q.subject_id AND q.deleted = false WHERE l.subject_id = (SELECT SUBJECT_ID FROM SUBJECTS S WHERE SUBJECT_name = #{subjectName}) AND l.deleted = false;
SELECT DISTINCT LEVEL FROM LEVELS WHERE deleted = false ORDER BY LEVEL asc
SELECT DISTINCT l.level FROM LEVELS l JOIN questions q ON q.LEVEL = l.LEVEL AND q.deleted = false WHERE l.deleted = false ORDER BY l.LEVEL asc
SELECT question_unit FROM question_unit_setting ORDER BY question_unit_id desc LIMIT 1
SELECT answer_id FROM answers WHERE question_id = #{questionId} AND is_correct = TRUE;
